# Sample S2P Files

This directory should contain sample S2P (2-port S-parameter) files for testing.

## Expected Files

- `sample.s2p` - Basic 2-port S-parameter file
- `sample_pri.s2p` - Sample PRI path file
- `sample_red.s2p` - Sample RED path file

## File Format

S2P files should be in Touchstone format (standard S-parameter file format).

## Note

Actual S-parameter files are binary/text data files. For now, this directory serves as a placeholder.
When implementing Phase 1, create actual S2P files using scikit-rf or obtain real test data.
